Claim: "Our current trajectory leads to a largely uninhabitable Earth."
Implication: "The breakdown of nations and the international order is imminent."
Referring expressions: Our current trajectory, Earth  Nations, international order
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsInhabitable(b) and ~IsCurrentTrajectory(a)))) -> (exists c (exists d (IsBreakingDown(c) and IsImminent(d))))
